sentences.en: As the term suggests, male pattern baldness follows a typical sequence or pattern.
sentences.cn: 这个术语暗示，男性模式光秃遵循一定的顺序或者模式。

sentences.en: Baldness does not mean there's anything wrong with him.
sentences.cn: 秃顶并不意味着他有什么不正常的地方.

sentences.en: Baldness is also likely due to abnormalities in several genes from one or both parents.
sentences.cn: 而孩子秃顶是因为来自父母一方或父母双方的几个基因发生了变异.

sentences.en: Don't mention baldness to Eddie . It's a sore point with him.
sentences.cn: 别对伊迪提起秃头之类的事, 他对这事很敏感.

sentences.en: Genetic predisposition is by far the most common cause of baldness.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止,遗传因素是造成秃顶的最主要原因.

sentences.en: He resents any allusion to his baldness.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌人家影射他秃顶.

sentences.en: He wears a cap to cover a spot of baldness.
I think I'll eventually lose all my hair. Baldness runs in my family.
sentences.cn: 我想总有一天我的头发会掉光. 秃头是我们的家族遗传.

sentences.en: Jill couldn't resist making jokes about his baldness.
sentences.cn: 吉尔忍不住拿他的秃顶开玩笑.

sentences.en: Julius Caesar wore a laurel wreath to cover the onset of baldness.
sentences.cn: 恺撒戴桂冠是为了掩饰秃头.

sentences.en: Listen to me, I have the prudence of Amphiaraus and the baldness of Caesar.
sentences.cn: 诸位听我讲, 我有安菲阿拉俄斯的谨慎和恺撒的秃顶.

sentences.en: Men also have hair dryers and, if they suffer from baldness, they use a growth stimulator, buy hairpieces, or have hair transplanted from the hirsute part of the scalp to the bare areas.
sentences.cn: 男士也有他们的吹风机,而且如果他们秃顶的话, 还会用毛发生长剂 、 买假发, 或者把头发从密集的地方移植到谢顶的地方.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the therapeutic effect of scalp dilatation by tissue expander for large cicatricial baldness.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨应用扩张器扩张皮肤软组织治疗瘢痕性秃发的效果.

sentences.en: This type of hair loss does not represent typical male baldness, but it does require a diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 这些类型的脱发都不能代表典型的男性光秃，但是它需要去诊治。
